Class ConsoleView

  • java.lang.Object
    • View.GameView
      • View.Console.ConsoleView

    public class ConsoleView
extends GameView
    A class representing the view of the game in the console.

    • Method Detail

      • update

        public void update​()
        A method which call the needed function depending on the state of the game.
        See Also:
        show(), askCardToPlay(), askColorChange()

      • askCardToPlay

        public void askCardToPlay​()
        Ask the player which card he wants to play. The choice is represented by a number from 0 to the number of card of the player.

      • show

        public void show​()
        This method show the actual state of the gam : the number of card in the stock the number of card in the discard the hand of the player the first card on the discard the actual color the message if there is one
